mods.abstract: Fiddle instrument demonstration by Buddy Spicher, Billy Contreras, Matthew Spicher and David Spicher from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on July 31, 2016. In support of the exhibit Dylan, Cash, and the Nashville Cats: A New Music City.

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
